extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller<Game>

    • Method Detail

      • fillRoundDisplay

        public void fillRoundDisplay()
        Method that fills the Label roundDisplay with the Information on whose turn it is and which action they are allowed to take.

      • doInitializations

        public void doInitializations(Game game,
                              ClientConnection client)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        Method for initializing everything, that needs to be done right after a FXML file and its controller have been loaded. It provides the possibility to pass an Object to the controller, e.g. the model object the view represents.
        Specified by:
        doInitializations in interface Controller<Game>
        Parameters:
        game - the object to pass to the controller.
        client - the ClientConnection used to send messages to the Server.

      • amplifyClickableButtons

        public void amplifyClickableButtons()
        Method that puts dropshadow behind currently clickable buttons to raise intuitive use

      • setApplicationController

        public void setApplicationController(ApplicationController applicationController)
        Sets the applicationController that is used to switch between scenes
        Parameters:
        applicationController - the applicationController

      • getRootPane

        public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getRootPane()
        Returns the root pane so that it can be scaled according to the window size in the applicationController
        Returns:
        the root pane
